evidence: the delta function acts like a perfect sampling tool
sampling property of the delta function
As the width of the delta function shrinks toward zero
The integral from minus infinity to infinity
stacking many delta functions across time

triples.evidence: The integral from minus infinity to infinity of delta of t minus t naught, times f of t, d t - equals f of t naught.
triples.o: value of f at t naught

triples.evidence: Even more fascinating - we can actually rebuild any continuous function using this idea.

evidence: The delta function acts like a perfect sampling tool.
The integral from minus infinity to infinity of delta of t minus t naught, times f of t, d t - equals f of t naught.
By stacking many delta functions across time, each weighted by the function's value at that point, we can reconstruct the entire function.

concepts.term: think of it like slicing the function into tiny pieces - each slice tells us something, and when you add them all together, you get the full picture again

evidence: The integral from minus infinity to infinity of delta of t minus t naught, times f of t, d t - equals f of t naught.
